page.title: 06Family Weekend, Rangeworthy
page.content:
{This is an example of a weekend}in the life of a local family told from the child's point of view. { {On Saturday,}I get up at 9.00, get dressed, go downstairs and have breakfast. At 10.30, we go shopping and come back at 12.00 for dinner. After washing up, Mother does some washing and puts it out to dry and later gets it in and does the ironing. At 3.00, we go out for a walk and later come in to watch a film on T.V. After the film, we have tea and then go jogging. At 7.30, I have a shower and then watch T.V. I go to bed at 9.00.
{This account is continued on Page 7
